Question
========
Which statement about the $χ^2$-distribution is true?

Answerlist
----------
* The $χ^2$-distribution cannot contain negative values.
* The $χ^2$-distribution is skewed to the left.
* The $χ^2$-distribution depends on two types of degrees of freedom.
* The $χ^2$-distribution is symmetric.
